divs: Sighting Details1.Outdoors, urinating.2.light change3.Mylar pig shaped balloon, except big and all lit up4.Peed on foot then fell to ground5.Pink and sort of looked like a cartoon pig at first. but not at second look.It moved slow then fast. And wobbled then sped away faster than a pig couldmove, so it wasnt a pig.6. Yes
trends: There has been one other sighting in Geneva
There were no other sightings in Geneva on or around October 12th 2002
